name: Total Arcade Racing
description:
Total Arcade Racing is a fun 2D top-down arcade racing game where you zip around closed circuits. This game is a tribute to the old classical top-down arcade racing games like Super Sprint, Slicks 'n' Slide and Super Cars. ​Play with 8 friends on the same screen in various game modes or challenge them online.​

KEY FEATURES

  • A variety of cars with different performance and handling
  • 5 Tracks (more will be included)
  • 4 game modes (Arcade Race, Time trial, Endless race, Demolition derby)
  • Online & Local multiplayer with support for 8 players. Max 4 on keyboard
  • Online Leaderboard support
  • Local ghost car replay of best time

Total Arcade Racing is still in development, the features above is what is included at the current stage of development, with your feedback and input the goal is to add more tracks and interesting game modes the future.
